name: Creatures of the Night: The Game
name_original: Creatures of the Night: The Game
description:
A visual novel adaptation of my short story web comic "Creatures of the Night" made for UA Game Dev Spring 2020  game jam. Play as Drach, a vampire assassin, and go on missions hunting the creatures that go bump in the night. Try not to die!

There is action and blood and death. You have been warned.
